headline: Is Mondelez International’s Portfolio Reshaping a Catalyst for Further Stock Growth in 2025?
summary: If you have been eyeing Mondelez International lately and wondering whether it's time to make a move, you're not alone. With a stock that has dipped about 4.1% over the last month but still sits up 2.1% year to date, investors are hesitant yet intrigued. The long-term picture paints a mixed image, too. Shares are down almost 10% over the past year, though they have gained nearly 29% across five years, suggesting plenty of resilience even as the market reassesses risks and opportunities. Much...
